snippet: In Silicon Valley, control by a company’s founder does not always translate into long-term success. | In Nokia deal, Microsoft is taking inspiration from Apple’s product strategy. | Vikram S. Pandit is betting on an upstart lender. | Two former...
abstract: In Silicon Valley, control by a company’s founder does not always translate into long-term success. | In Nokia deal, Microsoft is taking inspiration from Apple’s product strategy. | Vikram S. Pandit is betting on an upstart lender. | Two former Bear Stearns managers have won a fresh legal victory.

headline.main: Tech Titans Without Checks and Balances
